title: Lady Marmalade
artist: Christina Aguilera, Mya, Pink and Lil’Kim
lyrics:
[All - intro, clicking fingers]
(Gm)Hey sister, go sister, (C)soul sister, flow sister
(Gm)Hey sister, go sister, (C)soul sister, go sister
 
[Mya - start strumming]
He (Gm)met Marmalade down in (C)old Moulin Rouge,
(Gm)Struttin’ her stuff on the (C)street.
She said: (Cm)Hello, hey Joe, you wanna (Dm)give it a go?
 
[All - chorus]
(Gm)Gitchi, gitchi, ya-ya, da-(C)da
(Gm)Gitchi, gitchi, ya-ya (C)here
(Gm)Mocca chocolata, ya-(C)ya
(Cm)Creole lady Marma(Gm)lade
She said: (Gm)Voulez-vous coucher avec (C)moi, ce soir
(Gm)Voulez-vous avec (C)moi
 
[Pink]
He (Gm)sat in her boudoir while (C)she freshened up
(Gm)Boy drank all that... ma(C)gnolia wine,
On her (Cm) black satin sheets, I (Dm)swear he started to freak. When she said:
 
[All - chorus]
(Gm)Gitchi, gitchi, ya-ya, da-(C)da
(Gm)Gitchi, gitchi, ya-ya (C)here
(Gm)Mocca chocolata, ya-(C)ya
(Cm)Creole lady Marma(Gm)lade
She said: (Gm)Voulez-vous coucher avec (C)moi, ce soir
(Gm)Voulez-vous avec (C)moi
 
[Lil’ Kim - rap]
He come (Gm)through with the money in the garter belts
I (C)let him know we 'bout that cake straight up the gate
We (Gm)independent women, some mistake us for whores
I'm sayin', (C)why spend mine when I can spend yours
(Gm)Disagree? Well that's you and I'm sorry
I'mma (C)keep playing these cats out like Atari
Wearing (Gm)high-heel shoes, getting love from the dudes
Four (C)bad ass chicks from the Moulin Rouge
 
[All - sing]
(Gm)Hey sisters, soul sisters
(C) … Better get that dough sisters
 
[Lil’ Kim - rap]
(Gm)We drink wine with diamonds in the glass
By the (C)case the meaning of expensive taste
If you wanna (Gm)Gitchi, Gitchi, ya-ya
(C)Mocca Chocolata What?
(Cm)Creole Lady Marma(Gm)laaaaade
 
[All - bridge]
(G4)Marmalaaaaade [Christina Ooohs]
(G)Marmalaaaaade
(G4)Marmalaaaaade
(D)Hey… hey… hey-ey-ey-ey-ey-ey-ey
 
[Christina]
(Gm)Touch of her skin feeling (C)silky smooth,
(Gm)Color of cafe' au (C)lait
Made the (Cm)savage beast inside (Dm)roar, until he cried…
(D)More, more, more!
 
[Pink] (Gm)Now he's at home doing (C)nine to five
[Mya] (Gm) Livin’ the grey flannel (C)life
[Christina] But when he (Cm)turns off to sleep, (Dm)memories keep…
[All] (D)More, more, more!
 
[All - chorus]
(Gm)Gitchi, gitchi, ya-ya, da-(C)da
(Gm)Gitchi, gitchi, ya-ya (C)here
(Gm)Mocca chocolata, ya-(C)ya
(Cm)Creole lady Marma(Gm)laaaaaaade
(Gm)Voulez-vous coucher avec (C)moi, ce soir (ce soir)
(Gm)Voulez-vous avec (C)moi (all my sisters)
(Gm)Voulez-vous coucher avec (C)moi, ce soir (ce soir)
(Cm)Creole lady Marma(Gm - tremolo)laaaaade [end]
